miic.core.inversion.reconstruction_error¶

reconstruction_error(O, M, R)[source]¶

Reconstruction error calculation

For a general inverse problem of the form R = (M’*M)^(-1) * M’ * O, it calculates the reconstruction error O - rec_O where rec_O = M * R.

Parameters:
  • O (1D ndarray) – Vector of observed velocity change
  • M (2D ndarray) – Resolution matrix for the forward problem O=M*R
  • R (1D ndarray) – Vector of real velocity change
Return type:

1D ndarray
Returns:

rec_error: reconstruction error
